sql.query: select nvl(perapp.perapp_oldid,pdemo.demo_appid) as ApplicantID, pdemo.demo_appno, prd.prd_type, to_char(perapp.perapp_dob,'dd/mm/yyyy') as perapp_dob, perapp.perapp_education, perapp_employment, perapp.perapp_typeofprof, nvl(perapp_yrsexp,0) as perapp_yrsexp, perapp.perapp_oldid as OldID from per_demographics pdemo, applications app, products prd,perapplicant perapp where prd.prd_code = app_prdcode and app_no=demo_appno and perapp.perapp_id =demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a'

select ls.lifestyle_car, ls.lifestyle_scooter, ls.lifestyle_fridge, ls.lifestyle_telephone, ls.lifestyle_computer, ls.lifestyle_mobile, ls.lifestyle_washing_machine, ls.lifestyle_television from per_lifestyle ls where ls.lifestyle_appno='^'
select ldetails.loan_costloanprd, ldetails.offeredmargin, ldetails.loan_emi from loandetails ldetails where ldetails.loan_appno='^'
select perinctype,perinc_monsalary from perincexpenses where perinc_id=(select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a')
select sum(perinc_monsalary) as coapp_perinc_monsalary from perincexpenses,per_demographics where perinc_id=demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and demo_type='c' and demo_includeincome='2'
select ppdetails.prop_type1, NVL(ppdetails.prop_age,0) as prop_age from perpropertydet ppdetails where ppdetails.prop_appid ='^'
select auto_category as prop_type1,auto_model as prop_age from per_auto where auto_appno='^' and (auto_category='1' or auto_category='2')
select sum(lia.liab_balance)as liab_balance from per_liabilities lia where lia.liab_appno='^' and liab_applnt like'a%'

select sum(liab_balance)as coapp_liab_balance from per_liabilities,per_demographics where SUBSTR(liab_applnt,2,length(liab_applnt))=demo_appid and substr(liab_applnt,0,1)=demo_type and demo_type = 'c' and demo_appno='^' and demo_appno=liab_appno and demo_includeincome ='2'

select pinexp.perinc_autoloanexp, pinexp.perinc_yearsalary as perinc_takehome from perincexpenses pinexp where pinexp.perinc_id = (select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a')

select sum(pinexp.perinc_autoloanexp) as coappperinc_autoloanexp, sum(pinexp.perinc_yearsalary) as coapp_perinc_takehome from perincexpenses pinexp,per_demographics where pinexp.perinc_id =demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and demo_type='c' and demo_includeincome=2

select pinexp.perinc_otherexp,pinexp.perinc_rentexp as appother_deduction1, pinexp.perinc_domesticexp as appinsurance,pinexp.perinc_monsalary as app_perinc_monsalary from perincexpenses pinexp where pinexp.perinc_id = (select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a')

select sum(pinexp.perinc_otherexp) as coapp_other_deduction2,sum(pinexp.perinc_rentexp) as coapp_other_deduction1, sum(pinexp.perinc_domesticexp) as coapp_insurance,sum(pinexp.perinc_monsalary) as coapps_perinc_monsalary from perincexpenses pinexp,per_demographics where pinexp.perinc_id = demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and demo_type='c' and demo_includeincome=2
select app_usrid,to_char(app_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_createdate from applications where app_no='^'
select nvl(perapp.perapp_oldid,demo_appid) as ApplicantID, demo_appno from per_demographics, perapplicant perapp where perapp.perapp_id=demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and demo_type='a'
select prd_type from products where prd_code=(select app_prdcode from applications where app_no='^')
select edu_age from edu_student where edu_appno='^'
select perapp_education from perapplicant where perapp_id=(select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^'and demo_type='a')
select edu_marks from edu_details where edudetail_appno='^'
select edu_no_of_years from edu_student where edu_appno='^'
select perapp_employment from perapplicant where perapp_id=(select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='c')
select perapp_typeofprof from perapplicant where perapp_id in(select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='c')
select nvl(perapp_yrsexp,0) as perapp_yrsexp from perapplicant where perapp_id in(select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='c')
select perapp_residencetype from perapplicant where perapp_id= (select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^'and demo_type='c')
select perapp_yrsinpresadd from perapplicant where perapp_id= (select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='c')

select lifestyle_car, lifestyle_scooter, lifestyle_fridge, lifestyle_telephone,lifestyle_computer,lifestyle_mobile, lifestyle_washing_machine, lifestyle_television from per_lifestyle where lifestyle_appno='^'
select sum(ec.edu_col_total) AS totalcost from edu_course_exp ec,loandetails ld where ec.edu_appno=ld.loan_appno and ld.loan_appno='^' and UPPER(ec.EDU_TYPE)='E'
select loan_amtreqd as amtreq from loandetails where loan_appno='^'
select edu_studies_in,edu_qual_proposed,edu_partfull from edu_loan where eduloan_appno='^'
select edu_amount from edu_scholar where eduscholar_appno='^'
select (ld.loan_reqterms- pls.loan_noofinstallment) as tenor from loandetails ld, per_loan_secure pls where ld.loan_appno=pls.loan_appno and ld.loan_appno='^'
select COUNT(*) from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='^'

select perinc.perinctype,ld.loan_emi,perinc.perinc_monsalary from loandetails ld,perincexpenses perinc,per_demographics demo where ld.loan_appno=demo.demo_appno and demo.demo_appid=perinc.perinc_id and loan_appno='^' and demo.demo_type='^'
select sum(lia.liab_balance) as liab_balance from per_liabilities lia where lia.liab_appno='^' and liab_applnt like'a%'

select sum(liab_balance)as coapp_liab_balance from per_liabilities,per_demographics where SUBSTR(liab_applnt,2,length(liab_applnt))=demo_appid and substr(liab_applnt,0,1)=demo_type and demo_type='c' and demo_appno='^' and demo_appno=liab_appno and demo_includeincome ='2'

select pinexp.perinc_autoloanexp, pinexp.perinc_yearsalary as perinc_takehome from perincexpenses pinexp where pinexp.perinc_id = (select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='c' and demo_includeincome=2)

select sum(pinexp.perinc_autoloanexp) as coappperinc_autoloanexp, sum(pinexp.perinc_yearsalary) as coapp_perinc_takehome from perincexpenses pinexp,per_demographics where pinexp.perinc_id =demo_appid and demo_appno='^' and demo_type='c' and demo_includeincome=2

select (sum(perinc_domesticexp)+sum(perinc_rentexp)+sum(perinc_otherexp)) as otherexpenses,sum(perinc_autoloanexp) as perinc_autoloanexp from perincexpenses where perinc_id=(select demo_appid from per_demographics where demo_appno='^' and demo_type='c' and demo_includeincome=2)
select app_usrid,to_char(app_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as app_createdate from applications where app_no='^'
select SECTOR_CODE, SECTOR_NAME from RAM_LAPS_SECTORMASTER
select SEG_CODE, SEG_NAME from RAM_LAPS_MARKETSEGMASTER
select CC_ASSETCODE, CC_ASSETNAME from RAM_LAPS_ASSETCLASSMASTER
select RBI_INDUSTRY_CODE,RBI_INDUSTRY_NAME from RAM_LAPS_RBIINDUSTRYMASER
select cc_countrycode,cc_countryname from RAM_LAPS_COUNTRYMASTER

insert into laps_ram_companymaster (BORROWERTYPE, COMPANYCODE, COMPANYNAME, GROUPCODE, BRANCHLOCATION, COMPANYDELETED, COMPANYCOUNTRYCODE, COMPANYSECTORCODE, MARKETSEGMENT, STANDARDHOME, STANDARDHOST, CBSCOMPANYCODE, IRBHOME, IRBHOST, STATUS, RBIINDUSTRYCODE, MARKETPARTICIPANT, COMMERCIALBANK, PSENOTIFIED, CENTRALSOVERIGN) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select companysectorcode, companycountrycode, marketsegment, rbiindustrycode, standardhost, marketparticipant, commercialbank, psenotified, centralsoverign from laps_ram_companymaster where companycode='^' and borrowertype='C'
delete from laps_ram_companymaster where companycode=? and borrowertype='C'
select comapp_group,comapp_companyname,org_name,CBS_COMPANYCODE from comapplicant,organisations where org_scode=comapp_org_scode and comapp_id=^
select prd.prd_type from products prd where prd.prd_code=(select app_prdcode from applications where app_no='^')
insert into RAM_LAPS_SECTORMASTER (SECTOR_CODE, SECTOR_NAME, SECTOR_DELETED, SECTOR_BANKCODE)values(?,?,?,?)
delete from RAM_LAPS_SECTORMASTER where sector_code=?
insert into ram_laps_marketsegmaster( seg_code,seg_name, seg_deleted, bankcode, seg_overheadcost) values(?,?,?,?,?)
delete from ram_laps_marketsegmaster where seg_code=?

insert into ram_laps_assetclassmaster(cc_assetcode, cc_assetname, cc_approach, cc_assetdeleted, cc_assetcompclass, cc_assetdesc, cc_bankcode, cc_comp_approach, cc_comp_appext)values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from ram_laps_assetclassmaster where cc_assetcode=?
insert into ram_laps_countrymaster(cc_countrycode, cc_countryname, cc_countrydeleted, cc_bankcode, rw_sov_foreign)values(?,?,?,?,?)
delete from ram_laps_countrymaster where cc_countrycode=?
insert into ram_laps_rbiindustrymaser(rbi_industry_code, rbi_industry_name, rbi_industry_deleted, rbi_industry_bankcode)values(?,?,?,?)
delete from ram_laps_rbiindustrymaser where rbi_industry_code=?

insert into ramtolaps105(appno, branchname, regionname, companyname, companycode, dateoffinalisation, lastrateddate_basemodel, lastrating_basemodel, lastscore_basemodel, lastgradef_basemodel, lastrateddate_dynamicmodel, lastrating_dynamicmodel, lastscore_dynamicmodel, lastgradef_dynamicmodel, lastcombinedrating_dm, currentratingdate_basemodel, currentrating_basemodel, currentscore_basemodel, currentgradef_basemodel, currentratingdate_dynamicmodel, currentrating_dynamicmodel, currentscore_dynamicmodel, currentgradef_dynamicmodel, currentcombinedrating_dm, ratingrationale, ratingpoolremarks) values(?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?)

select branchname, regionname, companyname, companycode, to_char(dateoffinalisation,'dd/mm/yyyy') as dateoffinalisation , to_char(lastrateddate_basemodel,'dd/mm/yyyy') as lastrateddate_basemodel, lastrating_basemodel, lastscore_basemodel, lastgradef_basemodel, to_char(lastrateddate_dynamicmodel,'dd/mm/yyyy') as lastrateddate_dynamicmodel, lastrating_dynamicmodel, lastscore_dynamicmodel, lastgradef_dynamicmodel, lastcombinedrating_dm, to_char(currentratingdate_basemodel,'dd/mm/yyyy') as currentratingdate_basemodel, currentrating_basemodel, currentscore_basemodel, currentgradef_basemodel, to_char(currentratingdate_dynamicmodel,'dd/mm/yyyy') as currentratingdate_dynamicmodel, currentrating_dynamicmodel, currentscore_dynamicmodel, currentgradef_dynamicmodel, currentcombinedrating_dm, ratingrationale, ratingpoolremarks,remarks,extrating_remarks from ramtolaps105 where appno='^'

select Appno,BranchName,RegionName,CompanyCode ,to_char(DateofFinalisation,'dd/mm/yyyy') , to_char(LastRatedDate_BaseModel,'dd/mm/yyyy') ,LastRating_BaseModel , to_char(LastRatedDate_DynamicModel,'dd/mm/yyyy'),LastRating_DynamicModel, to_char(CurrentRatingDate_BaseModel,'dd/mm/yyyy'),CurrentRating_BaseModel, to_char(CurrentRatingDate_DynamicModel,'dd/mm/yyyy'),CurrentRating_DynamicModel, RatingRationale,RatingPoolRemarks from RAMTOLAPS105 where Appno='^'
delete from RAMTOLAPS105 where Appno=?
select FacilityName, cgrating, interestrate, laps_facility_id, laps_facility_parent, laps_facility_schemecode from RAMTOLAPS106 where appno='^' and laps_facility_id='^'

select Appno, sno, BranchName, CompanyCode, to_char(DateofFinalisation,'dd/mm/yyyy'), CreditRatingbyRatingPool, to_char(RatingPoolDate,'dd/mm/yyyy'), RatingConfirmedbyCG, CGRating, CGRationale, FacilityName, InterestRate, RatingReview, CGObservations, laps_facility_id, laps_facility_parent, laps_facility_schemecode from RAMTOLAPS106 where Appno='^'

select Appno, sno, BranchName, companyname, CompanyCode, to_char(DateofFinalisation,'dd/mm/yyyy')as DateofFinalisation, CreditRatingbyRatingPool, to_char(RatingPoolDate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as RatingPoolDate, RatingConfirmedbyCG, CGRating, CGRationale, FacilityName, InterestRate, RatingReview, CGObservations, laps_facility_id, laps_facility_parent, laps_facility_schemecode from RAMTOLAPS106 where Appno='^'
select sno, FacilityName,InterestRate from RAMTOLAPS106 where Appno='^' order by sno
delete from RAMTOLAPS106 where Appno=?
delete from ram_laps_retailscoring where rating_appno=?
select rating_score from ram_laps_retailscoring where rating_appno='^'
select rating_appno, rating_score, retail_grade,to_char(retail_dateoffinal,'dd/mm/yyyy') from ram_laps_retailscoring where rating_appno='^'
insert into ram_laps_retailscoring (rating_appno, rating_score, retail_grade, retail_dateoffinal) values(?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))
select ind_bsr_code,ind_name from industry_master
SELECT EXP_ID,EXP_DESC FROM EXPOSURE WHERE UPPER(EXP_TYPE)=UPPER('GROUP')
insert into IRB_Rating1 (Appno, serial_no, Description, Previous_year, Current_year) values (?,?,?,?,?)
insert into IRB_Rating2 (Appno, serial_no, parameter, value, secured, score) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from IRB_Rating1 where Appno=?
delete from IRB_Rating2 where Appno=?
select SEC_APPNO, SEC_DESC_ID, SEC_SRLNO, SEC_DESC_VALUE, SEC_TENOR from FAC_SECURITY_DETAILS where SEC_APPNO='^'
select SEC_APPNO,SEC_FACSNO,SEC_SRLNO,SEC_CHARGE, facility_sno from fac_security_details, facilities where facility_group='0' and facility_appno=sec_appno and SEC_APPNO='^'
select stat_data_sno, stat_data_desc, stat_data_id, stat_data_desc1,'N' as N from static_data where stat_data_id='12' order by stat_data_desc1

select FACility_catid,facility_schemecode,facility_catdesc, decode(facility_parent,'1','0','4','1','3','0') as fund, decode(facility_parent,'3','W','4','W','1','T') as fac_type,'N' as N from facility_master where facility_parent != 0 order by facility_catid

select facility_appno, facility_id, facility_sno, facility_proposed, App_valuesin as denomination, 'INR' as currency, facility_months, facility_interest from facilities,applications where FACILITY_APPNO='^' and facility_group='0' and FACILITY_APPNO=APP_NO
select comapp_oldid from COMAPPLICANT where comapp_id='^'
select comapp_irbid, comapp_companyname from COMAPPLICANT, com_demographics where comapp_id=demo_comappid and demo_appno='^'
delete from laps_ram_users
select usr_id, usr_grpid, usr_orgcode, usr_fname, usr_mname, usr_lname, usr_password, usr_class, usr_supid, usr_supstatus, usr_avail, usr_function, usr_sanction_limit, user_designation from users
insert into laps_ram_users(laps_id, user_code, user_password) values(?,?,?)
update laps_ram_users set laps_id =?, user_code=? where user_code=?
update laps_ram_users set user_password=? where user_code=?
select laps_id,user_password from laps_ram_users where laps_id = '^'
select usr_id,org_name from users,organisations where usr_orgcode=org_code and usr_id='^' and org_issaral = 'Y'
